LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreedatas.0.label: slowpoke
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreedatas.0.description: NAME is always falling behind the group whenever HE goes anywhere.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreedatas.1.label: fast walker
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreedatas.1.description: NAME likes to be where HE's going. HECAP walks quicker than most people.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreedatas.2.label: jogger
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreedatas.2.description: NAME always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreedatas.0.label: chemical fascination
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreedatas.0.description: NAME has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment. HECAP will consume much more of them, and will sometimes go on hard drug binges. HECAP will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreedatas.1.label: chemical interest
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreedatas.1.description: NAME has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. HECAP will consume more of them, and will sometimes go on social drug binges. HECAP will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreedatas.2.label: teetotaler
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreedatas.2.description: NAME abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.0.label: sanguine
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.0.description: NAME is just naturally upbeat about HIS situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.1.label: optimist
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.1.description: NAME is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get HIM down.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.2.label: pessimist
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.2.description: NAME tends to look on the bad side of life.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.3.label: depressive
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreedatas.3.description: NAME is perenially unhappy. HECAP has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.0.label: iron-willed
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.0.description: NAME's will is an iron shield. HECAP keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.1.label: steadfast
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.1.description: NAME is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.2.label: nervous
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.2.description: NAME tends to crack under pressure.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.3.label: volatile
LanguageData.Nerves.degreedatas.3.description: NAME is on a hair-trigger all the time. HECAP is the first to break in any tough situation.
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreedatas.0.label: neurotic
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreedatas.0.description: NAME likes to have things squared away. HECAP will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can get the better of HIM.
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreedatas.1.label: very neurotic
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreedatas.1.description: NAME feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. HECAP will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can easily get the better of HIM.
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.0.label: industrious
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.0.descriptio: NAME has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.1.label: hard worker
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.1.descriptio: NAME is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.2.label: lazy
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.2.descriptio: NAME is a little bit lazy.
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.3.label: slothful
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreedatas.3.descriptio: NAME loves idleness and hates anything productive. HECAP moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.0.label: psychically hypersensitive
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.0.descrip: NAME's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. HECAP is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.1.label: psychically sensitive
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.1.descrip: NAME's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.2.label: psychically dull
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.2.descrip: NAME's mind is psychically out of tune with others. HECAP isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.3.label: psychically deaf
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreedatas.3.descrip: NAME's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. HECAP just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.TemperaturePreference.degreedatas.0.desc: NAME's body produces tremendous amounts of heat. HECAP is comfortable in temperatures which would make anyone else shiver, but HE doesn't like heat.
LanguageData.TemperaturePreference.degreedatas.1.desc: NAME handles cool temperatures better than most.
LanguageData.TemperaturePreference.degreedatas.2.desc: NAME handles warm temperatures better than most.
LanguageData.TemperaturePreference.degreedatas.3.desc: NAME loves hot weather - but HE doesn't handle cold very well.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreedatas.0.label: careful shooter
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreedatas.0.descripti: NAME is a pretty good shot, but HE needs more time to focus on HIS target.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreedatas.1.label: trigger-happy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreedatas.1.descripti: Pew! Pew! Pew! NAME is a terrible shot, but HE doesn't care, because guns are awesome!
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.0.label: beautiful
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.0.description: NAME is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to HIM before HE even opens HIS mouth.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.1.label: pretty
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.1.description: NAME has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like HIM.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.2.label: ugly
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.2.description: NAME is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.3.label: staggeringly ugly
LanguageData.Beauty.degreedatas.3.description: NAME is staggeringly ugly. HISCAP face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at HIM while conversing.
